content.description:
Pitch 1: Bouldery start (protected by bolt) that gains a finger crack. This goes back and forth from tips to ringlocks with a pod or two included. Arrive at a bolt, step over into the left crack system and climb fingers/small hands for ~20', then step across back into the right crack system. Climb a hand crack that turns into rattly fists, then tapers back down to a handcrack before arriving at a large ledge. ~5.12-, ~150'

Pitch 2: Climb a less than vertical flaring system for approximately 20', then leave the crack system by traversing out to the right on easy slab. Climb up and right past two bolts, then gain a small ledge. From here climb harder slab (protected by 4 bolts to the summit. Tree anchor. ~5.10, ~115'

Rap Route with two ropes
content.location: See overview picture. 300 feet left of 'Number One' - Cavil

content.description:
Pitch 1: Climb a small crumbly section to gain and handcrack. After the handcrack dive into a small chimney and come out the lip with some hard offwidth moves. The rest of the pitch tapers from fists to hands. 5.11+ ~75'

Pitch 2: Climb on suspect rock for several moves and dive into a deep chimney. Chimney climb to the lip/roof of the chimney and pull out onto the crack with some hand/fist stacking or other OW techniques. The rest of the pitch varies from fist cracks to small hand cracks. 5.11 ~110'

Pitch 3: Climb short left facing corner to a ledge on the right. Protected by 2 bolts because of rock quality.Traverse right a few feet, then finish on low 5th. 5.9, 30'. Pitch shared with Caprica Six.

Rap route with 70 meter rope.
content.protection:
1-2X #0.3-1

3X #2-4

1X #5-8 (7&8 optional, but recommended)

Optional: Blue & Gold Big Bro
content.location: See overview picture. Start in left facing corner.

content.description:
Cause who doesn't wanna climb a crumbling, silty, dark, cold and runout offwidth to endless chimney in order to summit a tower made of Styrofoam ?

Pitch 1: Start on the left side of the formation to gain a ledge, traverse right over loose rock and clip a bolt, then climb up through a short, crumbling offwidth roof followed by a short section of sixes to a ledge. 60', 5.10

Pitch 2: Strenuous, extremely silty offwidth to arduous tight squeeze followed by 80' of sparsely protected undulating chimney 115', 5.11

Pitch 3: Lower from Pitch 2 anchor approximately 15' and stem over to the Gaius Baltower. Pull through four bolts to 5.7 face climbing to the summit mantle. 5.7 A0, 30'

Rap route the way you came up with one 70 meter rope.
content.protection:
Pitch 1: 1x Alpine draw, a couple small hand size pieces, 1x #3, 1x #6

Pitch 2: 2x Sixes, 1x Seven, 1x Eight and/or 2x Blue Big Bros and 1-2 Gold Big Bros, 4x Alpine draws

Pitch 3: 4x Alpine draws
content.location: Tower is located at the far right of the Galactic Wall... easily visible from in between Maverick Buttress and the fallen pillar. Located on the south aspect of the tower. Start on the left side of a chossy ledge. A bolt on the ledge/face above will give away the route location.

content.description:
Pitch 1: Start a handcrack that gradually opens to BD#4 just before the anchor. 5.10+, ~55'

Pitch 2: Hand-Fist stack your way up #5's for a while, then it gradually turns to #4's before it turns into very wide chimney climbing. 5.11 ~95'

Pitch 3: Climb a left facing corner that can be protected with a #6 and #7 or Green Bros. Arrive at massive ledge. 5.11, ~40'

Pitch 4: Climb short left facing corner to a ledge on the right. Protected by 2 bolts because of rock quality.Traverse right a few feet, then finish on low 5th. This pitch is shared with 'Cavil'. 5.9, ~30'

Rap 'Number One - Cavil' with one 70 Rope.
content.location: See overview picture. Look for the system that turns into a massive chimney at the top.
